name: Nostalgic Love Poem [1]
description: Anna the Hydra thought that she was the loneliest creature in the ocean, until little clownfish Tony appeared. No matter where he went, Tony would always swim back to her side. “I was born as one with you, and even death cannot separate us.”
effect: Max HP ＋200,When refining ＋6, Damage to Demi-human ＋5%

name: Nov. 2017 Gashapon Chest
description: Kafra's special headwear Gashapon toy chest, to express your sincere affection! Open it to receive friend's blessing cards and 10 headwear Gashapon toys relative to 10 months.

name: Nov. 2017 Premium
description: "This gorgeous and elegant and horrible party will end till dawn." To appreciate the adventurers who have been supporting us for a long time, the famous Kafra Company specially launched a special small card in the form of a monthly magazine. Hold it and you will feel its magical power. It's practical and highly collectible.

name: Novice Eggshell
description: Very hard eggshell used to wear on the head as a decoration.

name: Novice Eggshell Blueprint
description: Very hard eggshell used to wear on the head as a decoration.

name: Novice Poring Hat
description: Hat designed based the look of the popular monster, Poring. The material is certainly not stuffy rubber!

name: Novice Poring Hat Blueprint
description: Hat designed based the look of the popular monster, Poring. The material is certainly not stuffy rubber!

name: Novice Ring
description: In response to the call of general public, this ring was made with divine blessings. It guarded the novices to happily travel Midgard.

name: Novice Ring [1]
description: In response to the call of general public, this ring was made with divine blessings. It guarded the novices to happily travel Midgard.

name: Novice Romance
description: Hat mainly worn by elders. It reminds people of the happy time in their adolescence.

name: Novice's Blessing Chest
description: Welcome to RO, Eden Team has prepared some common items for you. After use, You can receive Zeny x100000, Lightning Chain x3, Kafra Storage Ticket x100, Kafra Teleport Ticket x20, Mystery Mercenary Ticket x5, Hot Meal x5, Blue Potion x50, White Potion x50

name: Nurse Cap
description: Hat worn by nurses who takes care of the patients in place of doctors.

name: Nurse Cap Blueprint
description: Hat worn by nurses who takes care of the patients in place of doctors.

name: Nurse Cap [1]
description: Hat worn by nurses who takes care of the patients in place of doctors.

name: Nut on Head
description: Put on it, and you're a scientific monster, too!

description: Put on it, and you're a scientific monster, too!
